name: Logic Solutions
tag_list: application-development-company, ann-arbor, michigan, web-application-development, mobile-application-development, custom-application-development, custom-software-development, managed-services, mobile-business-applications, enterprise-application-developm
overview:
Based in Ann Arbor, Michigan, Logic Solutions is a full-service application development company that designs, programs, and integrates custom web and mobile applications that enhance business productivity.

Logic provides solution architecture, web and mobile programming, application integration, business analysis, user interface design, and usability analysis. Its clients include automotive OEMs, universities, industry consortiums, Fortune 500 companies, SMEs, ad agencies, software firms, and more.

milestones.description: Of the 19 Michigan-based digital technology companies and institutions received Corp! awards, Logic was named the category's overall winner for going "above and beyond" the competition.
milestones.source_description: Logic Solutions Named Digital Company of the Year at Corp! DiSciTech Awards

milestones.description: Genisys Credit Union announces the release of its Mobile Banking app for for Android devices. Genisys launched Mobile Banking on Apple’s iOS platform in August 2012, and the app was quickly named one of the "Best Credit Union Mobile Banking Apps" on the m
milestones.source_description: Genisys Credit Union Works with Logic Solutions to Develop Mobile Banking App for Android

milestones.description: Logic Solutions and Larky, a venture-backed startup rooted in Ann Arbor, announce the updated Larky mobile app and website. The Larky app for iPhone can be downloaded today from the App Store.
milestones.source_description: Larky Partners with Logic Solutions to Enhance iOS App that Helps Users Maximize Membership Perks

milestones.description: Logic Solutions has added managed application development services to better address client resource management needs. Logic is a work-for-hire application development firm, specializing in web and mobile application development.
milestones.source_description: Logic Solutions Offers Managed Application Development Services with Dedicated Teams

milestones.description:
Logic Solutions announces the launch of the SaaS version of Showcase Mobile Sales System.  Showcase consists of a mobile app for iPad and a Content Management System (CMS) that provides a mobile solution for companies to display and sell products.
The Sh
milestones.source_description: Logic Solutions Launches SaaS Version of Showcase Mobile Sales System

milestones.description: Logic Solutions announced the official opening of a software development center in Taipei, Taiwan on October 1. The office is located in the Nankang Software Park, a world-renowned high-tech hub. Leo Chen has been named Director of the Taipei office.
milestones.source_description: Logic Solutions Opens Office in Taiwan

milestones.source_description: Logic Solutions' Mobile App Development Practice Triples

milestones.source_description: Logic Solutions Acquires Quantum Compliance Systems

milestones.source_description: Logic Solutions Launches MyPath Web Tool and iPad App with United States & Canadian Academy of Pathology

milestones.description: Logic Solutions announces that Bruce Richardson has been named President of Logic Solutions and Logic Systems Engineering.  Richardson has been COO of the companies since 2007.
milestones.source_description: Logic Solutions Names Bruce Richardson President
